website_summaries.verdict: A highly versatile system that comes with everything you need to enter and explore the world of airbrushing.
pros: This kit comes with 2 dual-action gravity feed airbrushes and a single-action siphon feed airbrush
You also get 6 opaque colors, a color mixing wheel, a reducer and a cleaner, along with a cleaning kit and instruction booklet
cons: It's important to inspect your package when it arrives to be sure that all the many parts are included

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this
customer_reviews.text: This product is cheap and that's what you pay for. Didn't use it much and it broke down on me. So I bought a more expensive one and haven't had any problems with it. I do taxidermy, so I thought it would work for that.
customer_reviews.author: Outrage

customer_reviews.title: Great value and so much fun.
customer_reviews.text: I jumped right into airbrushing 3d prints with this setup. Make sure to get a cleaning setup also when buying this because you will need it. The documentation and presentation of this kit was real nice. So far everything seems pretty durable. I wish there were more detailed instructions on how each airbrush can be adjusted because I got in a mess with the brushes pretty quickly when trying to figure it out. The beginner guide could be a little more detailed but I eventually figured out how to get paint to spray out haha.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: I'm so happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Thanks so much! I'm so happy with it! Comes with everything shown, no issues, nothing broken. We did look into a different kit but had lest. You guys had way more into the kit and I can't say no to the paint.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Broke after few uses
customer_reviews.text: Overall, liked the whole set. Perfect for beginners. Liked that had different guns, some paints, cleaning brushes and compressor to get started. And of course price was right! I was meticulous about cleaning after each use. Then after 6 uses, the nozzle broke on the G25 gun. Argh! Broke halfway on screw threads so it was not easy to get broken piece out! Now I have to buy new nozzle and needle just to finish my project. Disappointed in fabrication of this part. It's made to be taken off for cleaning, and in less than two months it broke. Will update review if company contacts me to replace the broken part.
customer_reviews.author: Richard R.

customer_reviews.title: Should had listened to the nay sayers for once.
customer_reviews.text: First day opening one needle was bent. Day two attempted to clean the tip and it snapped leaving the airbrush useless. After ordering a g233 gun everything seemed to be on track then my compressor burnt out. I'm contacting the customer service before asking for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Kollin

customer_reviews.title: Works well user friendly
customer_reviews.text: One of my hobbies is remote control rock crawlers. I paint each Lexan body according to my specific specs. This is user friendly & of a good weight, it's NOT a cheap item, it's constructed well😉. This kit allows greater control of paint flow, which lessens the need to tape & mask over🎨 You can get clean lines with no blow over mist. For large & small projects. It's a great product & a great buy👍 Familiarize yourself with the paint flow before working on your item. So happy I purchased this one
customer_reviews.author: Maj Mom

customer_reviews.title: Missing a cap & this set is not New.
customer_reviews.text: I do not like that I paid for a NEW Master Airbrush set that OBVIOUSLY doesn't appear NEW. IF your going to sell, PLEASE Be Honest and price your product for what it's worth. Also, I'm missing a cap for one of the airbrushes! Thats pretty important. How embarrassing to hand this over as a Gift! You may not get all the pieces and the packaging reveals it may have been used before or tampered with to some extent.
customer_reviews.author: Krishna

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst airbrush I have ever seen in the beginning it would work MAYBE 10 percent of the time and it quickly went down hill from there and after (TRYING) use it maybe ten times I had to take it apart probably 20 to 25 times to clean it AGAIN and every time I wasted all the paint and still could not get it to work. So I bought a Paasche talon Air Brush and it works every time like a Rolex Watch. Avoid at all costs Master air brush as it's just more chinese JUNK
customer_reviews.author: DAVID TATE

customer_reviews.title: My First Air Brush. Wish it had better manuals.
customer_reviews.text: I've been dreaming of having an airbrush since I was a teenager in the early 90's (back when airbrush t-shirts were in style). I finally bit the bullet and bought this set. I've only had it a few hours and I love it. The only issue I have is that the manuals are not very good. There are parts in each of the kits that there are not mentioned at all in the manuals. They have cards in each package advertising their learn to airbrush books and videos which might be why the manuals are so skinny, however; they should at least describe what each part is and what it's used for.
customer_reviews.author: Lance E. Boudreaux

customer_reviews.title: Very Dissapointing
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to get started only to find out my DELUXE KIT had no paint..very disappointed that I got cheated out of my money
customer_reviews.author: Kc

customer_reviews.title: Almost
customer_reviews.text: So this little guy was great, until I attempted to get the WORKING PSI over 20 PSI. I could get the PSI to drop and go from 0-20ish, but nothing over that. I was testing some thicker paints and techniques that required 30 PSI or there about. The customer service was good, as they sent me a new regulator, but it worked the same. For a beginner that just wants to spray some models, this thing is great and I thought the brushes sprayed pretty well for as cheap as this unit was. I just need something a little more versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S

customer_reviews.title: Motor Must Be Oiled
customer_reviews.text: After receiving this product and hooking it up, it ran for about 2 minutes before the motor locked up. After taking it apart and oiling the bearings, then reassembling it, it seems to run fine.
customer_reviews.author: trarol

customer_reviews.title: Compressor #2 Was DOA
customer_reviews.text: This was the replacement to the first purchase that stopped working after less than five minutes of use. I unboxed it; plugged in the compressor; turned it on. All it did was hum. It wouldn't run. Should I ask for another replacement or just get my money back and write it off as a bad decision to buy a really bad product. Really, how is it possible to get two bad units back to back?
customer_reviews.author: TKH

customer_reviews.title: Excellent set up!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift from my hubby. I’m still learning (watching a lot of YouTube!) I think it’ll be fun once I’ve got more experience. Comes with paints. Instructions. Quiet compressor. I did purchase cleaning solution and a paint pot separate tho.
customer_reviews.author: DLS

customer_reviews.title: english and arabic reviews 1) english good kit if you are just want to start airbrushing
customer_reviews.text: english and arabic reviews 1) english good kit if you are just want to start airbrushing ,, it comes with 3 airbrushs , two with same type “gravity” and one is the other one “with cup from inside” .. good quality overall ٢) عربي مجموعة ممتازة اذا كنت مبتدئ وتبي تتعلم على تلوين الايربرش ايي مع ٣ حبات مختلفة من الايربرش ٢ من نوع الجاذبية و ١ من نوع الثاني "خزان من تحت" يعني تقدر تعرف كل الانواع انصح فيه
customer_reviews.author: abdullah akbar

customer_reviews.title: Compressor DOA
customer_reviews.text: Was exited to receive the kit, disappointed the air compressor didn’t work. Looking in the back, it looks like there are wires that should hook into something. Will be returning it tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Boley

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: I saw a lot of negative comments about how customers didn't receive parts of the airbrush kit, it broke during use, or the airbrush nozzles would get clogged easily. However, after receiving my airbrush kit, it came with everything listed in the description. I've already used it a couple times and the performance is really great, didn't have any problems with it. I also think that it is pretty easy to use for beginners, an instruction manual is included in the kit as well as how to clean and care for your airbrushes. Overall I am very satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: brandon

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never airbrushed before so I did a lot of reading before purchasing this and I’m glad I did. It’s a great machine, easy setup, good instruction manuals lots of extras! It’s quiet too! I’ve worked around compressors before, I know loud!! This product was an open box, but came with everything. Nothing was missing. I am extremely happy with this machine!
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Airbrush kit
customer_reviews.text: Airbrushing has saved me a lot of time versus painting with brushes. Easy to learn and great results in a short period of time. I'm still learning through friends and youtube videos but I am having a great time. FYI, adjust the pressure setting as needed. I had it on high because I didn't know better. Also, use plumber's tape on the threads for a better seal and pressure. Good luck and have fun.
customer_reviews.author: Rich GMan

customer_reviews.title: Nice kit, returned as new siphon gun won't pass air, bad valve.
customer_reviews.text: Lots of value in this package if it works. The siphon feed airbrush had an issue with the air flow. It runs, then plugs up with no fuild, just open the brand new brush and connected to the sorry compressor. After several attempts to blow any junk out of the brush by blowing air in reverse. The gun would work then plug up after 15 seconds. You can't disassemble the air valve so I returned for s replacement. Tba on the second unit.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Easy enough for beginners and top notch like the pro’s
customer_reviews.text: It comes with everything you need to make you look like a pro. The colors are great and it is easy to use even if it’s your first time you ever held a airbrush. This just the beginning I can’t wait until I get everything down packed, the compressor itself is pretty quiet so I could practice anytime of the day or night.
customer_reviews.author: Troy G.

customer_reviews.title: A great kit to have if you are starting out.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used an airbrush in 20 years (I'm 34) and it feels good to use one again. When I ordered this for my 3D printing projects, I knew it was perfect for my work. It's easy to set up, easy to clean, and all I have to worry about is setting up the right amount of pressure to do my work. The paint it came with was great, but I recommend getting an airbrush surface primer with this to ease your pain. I can't wait to get more airbrushed and paint.
customer_reviews.author: KRGraphics

customer_reviews.title: Great airbrushing kit
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this for using on his woodworking crafts. I don’t think he has used it yet but he is very impressed with all of the attachments and other supplies included with this airbrushing kit.
customer_reviews.author: Karin Weld

customer_reviews.title: For the money I'd say it's fine, get's me through whatever I need to do
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this system for at least 6 months, still have the original paints. The major thing you have to understand is to clean your brushes extremely well. It is time consuming. The brushes are okay, they do clog and you have to fiddle with them, then again this is an inexpensive system. For the money I'd say it's fine, get's me through whatever I need to do, but not without some hassle.
customer_reviews.author: David Z

customer_reviews.title: Broken airbrushes, messed up pressure gauge. My experience was horrible
customer_reviews.text: Definitely do not recommend, broken pressure gauge. I thought this was going to be a fully working airbrush considering I payed over $145 for the package, 2 of the airbrushes don’t shoot out, Which is a complete disappointment since I only have 1 airbrush. the pressure gauge even when it’s lifted does not work to set up a particular pressure where as it just blows out randomly. It’s just a complete mess. Looked up many videos by the company and tutorials and their airbrushes were fully functioning unlike mine as well as their pressure gauge. It’s a complete waste of money, waste of time. Worst birthday present ever.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Better then expected
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t sure how well this setup would be. I’ve had it now for 2 months and so far, it’s working great. I was surprised the gravity feed gun works as good as it does. I also bought a Badger Sotar thinking the gravity feed that comes with this would be lacking. The paint isn’t great. I’d recommend getting good paint to use.
customer_reviews.author: Keo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Came quickly all parts are there very little assembly (just hoses and such) would like to have better instructions for use. I would recommend this to anyone. I use it for ceramics for glazes and acrylic and it works great very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know much about airbrushes when I bought this for my daughter. It is a decent beginners kit but with no pressure tank the compressor falls behind and the guns capabilities are rather limited I wish I would of spent the extra money for a pro kit
customer_reviews.author: Travis E. New

customer_reviews.title: Machine died within 20 seconds. Never got a chance to even use it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a couple months ago, but never used it because I've been ill. I finally opened it up today to check it out. I turned it on. Seemed like it had proper air pressure and working when it suddenly died on me before I ever even used it. I barely had turned it in when it died. I'm so very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what i would expect from something new.
customer_reviews.text: Airbrush didn't work due to air valve on the bottom of airbrush was stuck, 3 weeks later still no new part. After using another airbrush the compressor wouldn't hold air and run constantly, it seemed to get hot right away and then was worse and was not able to be consistent with painting, it would run then slow down and not produce air so I would get a stopping point then it would produce air and then all of the sudden I would get a large amount of paint. I will call company again and see what can be done to fix the air compressor issue.
customer_reviews.author: jim gamache

customer_reviews.title: Compressor stalls because its two halves begin separating while running ...
customer_reviews.text: Compressor stalls because its two halves begin separating while running. The fitment of the two halves is shoddy and work their way apart and then bind the shaft causing the motor to stall and hum. I've temporarily fixed it by just clamping the two halves together and will fix permanently with adhesive but I shouldn't need to!
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Working great
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this compressor. I am using it for alcohol ink art. I purchased a longer air supply line so that I can put the compressor in the other room to cut down on noise. This is a very good value!
customer_reviews.author: tnc

customer_reviews.title: Broken on day 2.
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box i was ready to give this a 4. Easy to set up and use. Then on day 2 the main gravity fed airbrush broke during cleaning. I was using the supplied 'chuck' to unscrew the needle housing and the soft metal its made of simply snapped. Pretty disappointing. The compressor itself seems solid as does the siphon feed airbrush so I will reach out to the manufacturer for a replacement airbrush or purchase another. I will edit this review if a replacement is actually given.
customer_reviews.author: Brianm

customer_reviews.title: If you buy make sure you use within the first 30 days so it can be sent back cuz it don't work
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for Father's Day. He works so much he was not able to even use it until just recently, he was able to use at one time and now none of the guns work. Yes he did check to see if there was a bent needle which there wasn't and he thoroughly cleans the guns with the proper cleaner. None of the guns will spray any paint I do not recommend this kit at all
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lilley

customer_reviews.title: Worth It
customer_reviews.text: I just got into airbrushing for modeling and I like this set. Have already used dozens of times without an issue. The paint is a whole new ballgame, on plastic it is easily scraped off but I did expect the paint to be bad so I use it for practice. Plan on getting a better cleaning brush the one that's comes with the kit just throw away the little bristles will come off inside airbrush.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Compressor died in the first week.
customer_reviews.text: Compressor died the second day of use. You could grab a nice airbrush and compressor for about $200 or buy this junk and return it then buy a nice compressor and airbrush for $200. You’re not saving money with this you are wasting time.
customer_reviews.author: jacob

customer_reviews.title: Great set up for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This set is great for beginners getting into air brushing!! It comes with everything you need to start painting right out of the box. With a little practice I was off and running painting and priming my first tabletop miniatures it is so easy to use. It is really easy to clean for the general clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Buckmaster

customer_reviews.title: E91 Siphon Air brush leaks
customer_reviews.text: The E91 siphon air brush leaks. Air hose connection is metal and is press fitted into the plastic air brush. It does not appear to seal and leaks alot of air.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this, recommend going to there site and watching how to videos before use. Detail was great, compressor is not very loud. There paints worked well with brush, all and all was very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Compressor will not keep pressure..
customer_reviews.text: When I set the pressure on the compressor it will hold pressure but when I use it it will not keep pressure? The pressure goes down to zero and does not reset for about 30 to 60 seconds. It makes it impossible to use. I would think you could adjust the high and low range?
customer_reviews.author: Steven K.

customer_reviews.title: Great for all applications and experience levels.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband to touch up his taxidermy mounts (he never used an airbrush before) and he loved it. His mother is an artist and experienced in using airbrushes, she has also been using it absolutely loves it. Great for all applications and experience levels.
customer_reviews.author: evie

customer_reviews.title: Tried 1st Time Today
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't recommened the paint just buy better paint but i didnt buy this for the paint!!! This is amazing, Im taking my Dioramas to the NEXT level So happy
customer_reviews.author: Butch Meathook

customer_reviews.title: Brushes good, compressor, not so much
customer_reviews.text: The air brushes are good but the compressor, not so much. I was getting really uneven spray and then I hooked it up to my larger air compressor and had no problems. I would get the brushes but purchase a better air compressor.
customer_reviews.author: IAF

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome airbrushed. I bought this as a xmas gift for my fiance and he love it. Everything was in the package and everything work well. I definitely recommend this airbrushed. Easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Hey dee

customer_reviews.title: Good airbrush pump
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. It does tend to get a little warm even with the dual fans but that did not interrupt operation
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Terry A. Lang

customer_reviews.title: Unsteady paint flow
customer_reviews.text: Everything came with my deluxe kit and set up/clean up was pretty standard. My main problem is that I don’t get a continuous paint flow. It comes in waves and makes painting details impossible. Maybe the compressor is bad? I’m not completely sure but I’m a little sad.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe Winona

customer_reviews.title: Finally Got An Airbrush Kit
customer_reviews.text: I've been needing an airbrush kit for a while for all the D&D miniatures and terrain I make. My wife got this for me and it is FANTASTIC. It's so easy to use and so easy to clean that I would recommend it to ANY beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Only have used this 3 times and the motor quits on the compressor just as its out of warranty. How convenient
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.text: DISAPPOINTED....I have ordered for South Korea, expected to receive a 220 V compressor, but 110 compressor received. Can not be used :),no description about working voltage in the page.... :((
customer_reviews.author: Corneliu Tigita

customer_reviews.title: Good basic airbrush system
customer_reviews.text: I use this to varnish paintings with acrylic gloss varnish. It works well. Probably would have been worth buying the next model up (with the tank for higher sustained pressure.)
customer_reviews.author: David O.

customer_reviews.title: Everything but templates and someone's face to practice on
customer_reviews.text: This is my first airbrush. It and it's paints were of a far better quality than I expected. She has so far been very good to me. The compressor keeps up with my demands that it do things which is not the airbrush. I used the black straight out of the bottle with no problems. Then had to learn to strain blacks of what is commonly accepted as 'better quality' paint.
customer_reviews.author: alamonelf

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter. She loves it! If there is any issue is that it is a little loud. But they are.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck57

customer_reviews.title: Beginner in mind when this kit was put together
customer_reviews.text: I’m a beginner , I’m finding out that this is a great kit for me , it has a little bit of everything to get my feet wet . And find out what works best for me .
customer_reviews.author: Nick Niven

customer_reviews.title: Awful! Cheap! After only 1 week!!! Dont buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Suuuppppeeerrrr cheap! Had it for less then a week. Went to clean the nozzles. Unscrewed the tips and the threads sheared off inside the gun. Completely unusable now. What a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Hook'Em Fishing Products

customer_reviews.title: So many uses.
customer_reviews.text: Wife decorates cakes as a hobby. She loves it, still just practicing to come up to speed.
customer_reviews.author: Chicagodogs

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my Dad. He was very satisfied with the quality! Delivery was sooner than expected so it definitely arrived before the timeframe I needed for his birthday! Thank You! Great Purchase , Great Price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Problems with attaching regulator
customer_reviews.text: I still haven't been able to get the regulator on because the rubber seal get ripped up every time I try and tighten it. I bought it for a project, but was unable to use it right away, so I didn't know about the problems until it was too late to send it back. On a good note, they were great about shipping quickly, which is always very nice.
customer_reviews.author: RCFCU

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, way better than last one we tried.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this one after the first one I bought my financé lasted 30 days. It's very solid construction, works great! Should have gotten this one in the first place
customer_reviews.author: coogle

customer_reviews.title: gift
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what my son wanted and so far is holding up great. The nozzle sprays evenly and is easy to use. Great quality
customer_reviews.author: Paul Cohn

customer_reviews.title: Beginner
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to take up air brushing as a hobby. Still learning, but has been fun so far. Equipment works well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Work
customer_reviews.text: Wasted my money. Gave this as a gift to my daughter and she tried it today for the first time and it worked for a minute and now it will not do anything and I can not get my money back. She is so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t missing anything all works very well great value for the money
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality machine. Comes w iui th lots of extras and works great .
customer_reviews.author: Daniell Peri

customer_reviews.title: Great product, lousy paints.
customer_reviews.text: The compressor and guns are great, especially for a beginner. The paints, that come with it, however, leave MUCH to be desired. Go to A. C. Moore and get yourself some "Spectra" brand airbrush paint....MUCH better, covers better, sprays better AND looks MUCH better. Other than the paints, that come with it, it is really good!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa R.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: I just started airbrushing when I got this as a Christmas gift. It works perfect for me. The only issue I had was one of the guns broke but amazon replaced it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Not as shown
customer_reviews.text: I just received my kit and have not had a chance to use it yet. I will update this later this week or next after I have a chance to set it up and use it. There was no instructional video or color mixing wheel with the kit as labeled. The paints where Neon, I really needed the opaque.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Laverick

customer_reviews.title: Ordered this for our son. He loves it! ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for our son. He loves it!!!! Well worth it. He had been asking for an airbrush for quite some time and we kept putting it off because we thought it would be much more expensive. He has barely put it down and the art he is doing with it is phenomenal. Would definitely suggest product to anyone looking to getting into airbrushing,
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this so much. This is my first time I ever bought an airbrush kit and will highly recommend to everyone
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need is in the box!  Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need is in the box! Easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Pemone

customer_reviews.title: Get lots of cleaner
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old loves it. Gravity fed brush is hard to keep clean for her but we haven't tried the siphon ones yet. Get lots of cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: bri

customer_reviews.title: Cheap airbrush
customer_reviews.text: All was great, but the airbrushes are bad. First project 2 brushes didn’t work and second project the airbrushes that was working the switch for letting spray out broke. Don’t use the airbrushes, buy better ones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Never again
customer_reviews.text: Lot came and was almost in pieces not even useable
customer_reviews.author: Ashlei Borden

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I am a first time user and I found the directions easy to follow and the airbrush was easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Alert people don’t lost money buy this
customer_reviews.text: Bad, don’t work, lost my money, it’s bad very bad compressor, don’t buy this you go lost money, the compressor the buyer is only for garbage Horrible compressor
customer_reviews.author: Marcio

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent Paint Flow
customer_reviews.text: Really neat and easy to set up. Only issue I have (but a significant issue) is that the sprayer has a very inconsistent flow. Nothing will come out and then all the sudden it will spray too much paint. I’ve only had it for a day...
customer_reviews.author: Margot  Kelly

customer_reviews.title: here is the way to start
customer_reviews.text: perfect kit for anyone who would like to start in with an airbrush has some tips for the new airbrush student has everything you need to get started.
customer_reviews.author: Chris69

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and value
customer_reviews.text: Definitely good quality for beginners I'm still learning this kit makes it a little easier
customer_reviews.author: Donna o danna

customer_reviews.title: Which 110 volts huge transformer for foreign operation
customer_reviews.text: Chalk this article to a friend of mine some Brazil who is an artist she's already up and using it and so excited.
customer_reviews.author: skip

customer_reviews.title: Hobby
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use for water based paint but the cleanup is worth it for the results for other types of paint
customer_reviews.author: Monty Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Best investment
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 11 yr old grandson he loves it
customer_reviews.author: stefanie mccray

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it is quiet and easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Wong

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Everthing was in the box. Worked great good price for all you get. Pump is super quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Very good tool!
customer_reviews.text: Works great out of the box, all the spray guns and compressor worked, definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed this machine as a beginner. The cleaning of the machine is a pain in the butt. But I used it to touch up my car and it did it.

customer_reviews.text: What I like most of that it came with 3 different types of airbrush machines to use what I didn't like about it is that one of the machines requires bottle and I wish you would have came with multiple bottle for usage besides having just one bottle.

product_meta.title: Master Airbrush Cool Runner II Dual Fan Air Compressor Professional Airbrushing System Kit with 3 Airbrushes, Gravity and Siphon Feed - 6 Primary Opaque Colors Acrylic Paint Artist Set - How to Guide
feature_bullets: Professional Master Airbrush Multi-Purpose Airbrushing System with 3 of Master Airbrushes best selling & user friendly airbrushes. Includes bonus Master Airbrush Quick Start Guide and Airbrush Resource Center access card.

Master Airbrush Model TC-320 Cool Runner II superior performance powerful 1/5 hp single-piston compressor with two cooling fans that allow it to run much cooler for a longer continuous running time without overheating. Includes airbrush holder for 2 airbrushes.

3 Types of Master Airbrushes: Model G22 dual-action with a 1/3 oz. gravity feed fluid cup and 0.3mm tip, Model G25 dual-action with a 1/16 oz. gravity feed fluid cup and 0.2mm tip, plus a Model E91 single-action siphon feed with a 0.8mm tip and 2 - 3/4 oz. siphon bottles.

U.S. Art Supply Primary Colors Water-Based Acrylic Airbrush Paint Kit (6 Colors in 1 oz. Bottles plus Reducer and Cleaner). 6 Opaque colors included: bright sapphire blue, grass green, bright yellow, bright red, deep black and white. Bonus double sided color mixing wheel and cleaning brush set.

100% Satisfaction Guarantee: Buy with confidence, if you're not satisfied with these airbrushes at anytime within the first year of purchase or the compressor within the five years of purchase, we'll provide a refund or replacement.
